summary: This is an internal FBI email chain confirming arrangements for victim briefings in the Epstein case in Miami and New York. It includes draft invitation language for victims to attend meetings in October 2019 to learn about available victim services.

persons.name: Sosa
persons.context: Mentioned as having reserved a conference room for the Epstein victim briefing in Miami.

persons.name: Pam
persons.context: Will work on additional Victim Specialists to support the briefings in Miami and New York.

connections.description: Both are FBI staff involved in organizing victim briefings for the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in Miramar, FL.

events.title: Epstein Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in New York, NY.

events.title: Confirmation of Victim Briefings
events.description: The FBI receives confirmation to conduct victim briefings for the Epstein case in Miami and New York.

keyFacts: The FBI confirmed plans to conduct victim briefings for the Epstein case in both Miami and New York in October 2019.
Victims were invited to attend meetings to learn about victim services available to them, though specific investigation details would not be provided.
The email includes specific dates, times, and addresses for the briefings: October 15 in Miramar, FL and October 23 in New York, NY.
Participation was limited to the victim and one support person, with a response deadline of October 4, 2019.
The document shows coordination between FBI Victim Services, the FBI NY Field Office, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
